meanings.definition: A person who owns or works on a dairy farm.
meanings.sent1: The dairymen milk the cows every morning.
meanings.sent2: The dairymen deliver fresh milk to the market.
meanings.sent3: The dairymen had a cow-milking contest for fun.
meanings.sent4: The dairymen are the backbone of the dairy industry.
meanings.sent5: The dairymen wear overalls and carry buckets of milk.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of dairymen at the dairy farm.
meanings.sent2: The dairymen were skilled in caring for the cows.
meanings.sent3: The dairymen gathered for a group photo at the farm.
meanings.sent4: The dairymen worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The dairymen were proud of their dairy farm achievements.
